quote: Despite all the other factors that had contributed to my fate, in the end it was my decision that destroyed my life. And all the hurt I was enduring now was my doing. The blame rested solely with me.
quote_letters: DESPITE ALL THE OTHER FACTORS THAT HAD CONTRIBUTED TO MY FATE IN THE END IT WAS MY DECISION THAT DESTROYED MY LIFE AND ALL THE HURT I WAS ENDURING NOW WAS MY DOING THE BLAME RESTED SOLELY WITH ME
